arts.sum: Enzo Maresca says Cole Palmer will be assessed ahead of our Carabao Cup third round tie at Lincoln City, but the contest comes too soon for Benoit Badiashile and Romeo Lavia. 'Cole is probably the only one that we need to assess a little bit,' Maresca explained.
